Open Beta

iWallic wallet important announcement:


Due to the adjustment of the NEO main network before, iWallic wallet was affected and some functions failed. It has been fixed. The problems such as the failure of the transfer display during the previous repair period and the timeout of the asset page login are all restored to normal.


In addition, the iwallic wallet is only to show the details of the blockchain transaction, all transactions are completed by the blockchain, so there is no loss of assets on the wallet, please do not worry. If you have any questions during the use, you can use the customer service micro signal: EXChain001!

November 19, 2018
